title: I did not received RP point.
body:
I already paid $20 for buying skin but i did not received RP point. So, I paid again....
plz check

replies.body: Sometimes those purchases can take a little bit to get the RP added onto your account. In the future, try closing and reopening the client to see if those numbers refresh, and if not go ahead and hit us up in a ticket before just trying to buy the points again. I wouldn't want you to double charge yourself and end up with more than you wanted!
